ThingDef.Name: carnap_andesiteBase
ThingDef.label: andesite
ThingDef.description: A volcanic rock formed by rapid cooling of lava.

ThingDef.label: smoothed andesite
ThingDef.description: An intermediate volcanic rock. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_dioriteBase
ThingDef.label: diorite
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by slow cooling of magma.

ThingDef.label: smoothed diorite
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by slow cooling of magma. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_basaltBase
ThingDef.label: basalt
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by rapid cooling of basaltic lava.

ThingDef.label: smoothed basalt
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by rapid cooling of basaltic lava. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_tuffBase
ThingDef.label: tuff
ThingDef.description: A soft rock formed by consolidation of volcanic ash.

ThingDef.label: smoothed tuff
ThingDef.description: A soft rock formed by consolidation of volcanic ash. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_quartziteBase
ThingDef.label: quartzite
ThingDef.description: A rock converted from sandstone due to heating and pressure from tectonic compression.

ThingDef.label: smoothed quartzite
ThingDef.description: An rock converted from sandstone due to heating and pressure from tectonic compression. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_soapstoneBase
ThingDef.label: soapstone
ThingDef.description: A very soft rock converted from various minerals through a combination of heating, pressure and time.

ThingDef.label: smoothed soapstone
ThingDef.description: A rock converted from sandstone due to heating and pressure from tectonic compression. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_gneissBase
ThingDef.label: gneiss
ThingDef.description: A common and widely distributed type of metamorphic rock.

ThingDef.label: smoothed gneiss
ThingDef.description: A common and widely distributed type of metamorphic rock. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_schistBase
ThingDef.label: schist
ThingDef.description: A rock which consists of layers of different minerals.

ThingDef.label: smoothed schist
ThingDef.description: A rock which consists of layers of different minerals. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_chalkBase
ThingDef.label: chalk
ThingDef.description: A very soft rock formed from the skeletal remains of sea creatures.

ThingDef.label: smoothed chalk
ThingDef.description: A rock formed from the skeletal remains of sea creatures. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_siltstoneBase
ThingDef.label: siltstone
ThingDef.description: A rock composed mostly of silt.

ThingDef.label: smoothed siltstone
ThingDef.description: A rock composed mostly of silt. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_shaleBase
ThingDef.label: shale
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by the compaction of silt and clay-size mineral particles.

ThingDef.label: smoothed shale
ThingDef.description: A rock formed by the compaction of silt and clay-size mineral particles. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_mudstoneBase
ThingDef.label: mudstone
ThingDef.description: An ugly rock formed from consolidated mud.

ThingDef.label: smoothed mudstone
ThingDef.description: A rock formed from consolidated mud. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_claystoneBase
ThingDef.label: claystone
ThingDef.description: A rock composed primarily of clay-sized particles.

ThingDef.label: smoothed claystone
ThingDef.description: A rock formed from consolidated mud. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_pumiceBase
ThingDef.label: pumice
ThingDef.description: A rock produced when lava with a very high content of water and gases is discharged from a volcano.

ThingDef.label: smoothed pumice
ThingDef.description: A rock formed from consolidated mud. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_conglomerateBase
ThingDef.label: conglomerate
ThingDef.description: A rock composed of rounded fragments embedded in a matrix of cementing material such as sand, silt, and clay.

ThingDef.label: smoothed conglomerate
ThingDef.description: A rock composed of rounded fragments embedded in a matrix of cementing material such as sand, silt, and clay. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_amphiboliteBase
ThingDef.label: amphibolite
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting mainly of hornblende and plagioclase.

ThingDef.label: smoothed amphibolite
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting mainly of hornblende and plagioclase. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_anorthositeBase
ThingDef.label: anorthosite
ThingDef.description: A rock composed largely of labradorite.

ThingDef.label: smoothed anorthosite
ThingDef.description: A rock composed largely of labradorite. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_brecciaBase
ThingDef.label: breccia
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting of angular fragments of stones cemented by finer calcareous material.

ThingDef.label: smoothed breccia
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting of angular fragments of stones cemented by finer calcareous material. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_dolostoneBase
ThingDef.label: dolostone
ThingDef.description: A rock formed chiefly of dolomite.

ThingDef.label: smoothed dolostone
ThingDef.description: A rock formed chiefly of dolomite. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_duniteBase
ThingDef.label: dunite
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting largely of olivine.

ThingDef.label: smoothed dunite
ThingDef.description: A rock consisting largely of olivine. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_porphyryBase
ThingDef.label: porphyry
ThingDef.description: A rock containing crystals of feldspar in a fine-grained groundmass.

ThingDef.label: smoothed porphyry
ThingDef.description: A rock containing crystals of feldspar in a fine-grained groundmass. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_rhyoliteBase
ThingDef.label: rhyolite
ThingDef.description: A rock rhyolite formed when lava cools down on or near the earth's surface.

ThingDef.label: smoothed rhyolite
ThingDef.description: A rock rhyolite formed when lava cools down on or near the earth's surface. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_syeniteBase
ThingDef.label: syenite
ThingDef.description: A rock syenite composed mainly of alkali feldspar and ferromagnesian minerals.

ThingDef.label: smoothed syenite
ThingDef.description: A rock syenite composed mainly of alkali feldspar and ferromagnesian minerals. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_obsidianBase
ThingDef.label: obsidian
ThingDef.description: A brittle volcanic rock formed by rapid cooling of lava.

ThingDef.label: smoothed obsidian
ThingDef.description: A brittle volcanic rock formed by rapid cooling of lava. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.

ThingDef.Name: carnap_desertglassBase
ThingDef.label: desert glass
ThingDef.description: Solid desert glass formed by radiative melting of sandstone from large aerial bursts.

ThingDef.label: smoothed desertglass
ThingDef.description: Solid desert glass formed by radiative melting of sandstone from large aerial bursts. It has been polished to a flat, smooth surface.
